name: Lumen Blast
description:
Apologies if you are experiencing audio issues. This is being addressed. Blast through multiple waves of asteroids

Destroy each asteroid by determining its unique vulnerabilities

Controls

W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys: move

Left Mouse Click: shoot

Right Mouse Click: switch ammo

R: restart level

ESC: pause

Credits

Ronnie Sallan: Game Design & Programming

Leo 'Awez' Chenevert: Art & Animation

Jake Archer: Sound Design & Music

Misc.

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jame (Week 157). The theme was 'Vulnerable Invincible'.
